tools/bb2exo.c

00037 /**
00038  * \file bb2exo.c
00039  * \brief Convert bounding box file to exodus dataset
00040  *
00041  * $Source: /home/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/bb2exo.c,v $
00042  * $Revision: 1.6 $ 
00043  * $Date: 2006/11/07 23:49:03 $
00044  *
00045  * \description
00046  *
00047  *   Reads a bounding box file (see \ref threshBoundBox.c) and creates
00048  *   a new Exodus dataset with a mesh for each bounding box.
00049  *
00050  *   The naming convention of the bb meshes is: name_step#, where
00051  *   the name and step# are the same as the attributes on the bb element.
00052  *   (The step# is appended to help pick bb since the exo file doesn't
00053  *   have time.)
00054  *
00055  * \todo Should probably make a version 'bb2fc' where can choose final
00056  *    file type with '-t' like w/ fcconvert.
00057  *
00058  * \modifications
00059  *    - 03/01/2006 WSD, created.
00060  *    - 06/29/2006 WSD, converted to new bb file format.
00061  */
00062 
00063 #include <string.h>
00064 #include <stdio.h>
00065 #include "fc.h"
00066 #include "fcP.h" // temporary until readBB stuff gets made public
00067 
00068 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00069   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00070   int i;
00071   char* bbfile_name = NULL;
00072   char* base_name;
00073   char* exofile_name;
00074   char mesh_name_buf[1024];
00075   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET;
00076   FC_Dataset dataset;
00077   FC_Mesh mesh;
00078   int numBB, *stepIDs;
00079   FC_Coords *lows, *highs;
00080   char** bbNames, **comments;
00081 
00082   // handle arguments
00083   if (argc < 2) {
00084   usage:
00085     printf("Will create Exodus dataset (with name file.ex2)\n");
00086     printf("usage: bb2exo [options] file.bb\n");
00087     printf("options: \n");
00088     printf("   -h            : print this help message\n");
00089     printf("   -v            : verbose: print warning and error messages\n");
00090     printf("   -V            : very verbose: prints log and error messages\n");
00091     fflush(NULL);
00092     exit(-1);
00093   }
00094   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00095     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00096       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;
00097     }
00098     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00099       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;
00100     }
00101     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2))
00102       goto usage;
00103     else {
00104       if (i + 1 > argc)
00105      goto usage;
00106       bbfile_name = argv[i];
00107     }
00108   }
00109   if (!bbfile_name)
00110     goto usage;
00111 
00112   // init library 
00113   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00114   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00115   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00116   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00117 
00118   // read the bb file
00119   rc = _fc_readBBFile(bbfile_name, &numBB, &bbNames, &stepIDs, &comments,
00120                 &lows, &highs);
00121   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to read bb file '%s'", bbfile_name);
00122   if (numBB < 1) {
00123     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "No bounding boxes found in bb file '%s'", 
00124                 bbfile_name);
00125   }
00126     
00127   // create name of exodus file
00128   base_name = fc_getBasenameWOExtension(bbfile_name, 1);
00129   exofile_name = (char*)malloc((strlen(base_name)+5)*sizeof(char));
00130   if (!base_name || !exofile_name) 
00131     fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00132   sprintf(exofile_name, "%s.ex2", base_name);
00133   free(base_name);
00134 
00135   // create a dataset to put bb meshes into
00136   rc = fc_createDataset("Bounding Boxes", &dataset);
00137   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to create dataset");
00138 
00139   // FIX? short by stepID?
00140 
00141   // For each line in bb, create a bbmesh
00142   for (i = 0; i < numBB; i++) {
00143     // FIX unhardcode size of name
00144     if (stepIDs[i] < 0)
00145       sprintf(mesh_name_buf, "%s_nostep", bbNames[i]);
00146     else
00147       sprintf(mesh_name_buf, "%s_step%d", bbNames[i], stepIDs[i]);
00148     rc = fc_createBoundingBoxMesh(dataset, mesh_name_buf, 3, lows[i], highs[i],
00149                       &mesh);
00150     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to create bounding box mesh with "
00151                 "([%g,%g,%g],[%g,%g,%g])", lows[i][0], lows[i][1],
00152                 lows[i][2], highs[i][0], highs[i][1], highs[i][2]);
00153     free(bbNames[i]);
00154     free(comments[i]);
00155   }
00156   free(bbNames);
00157   free(comments);
00158   free(stepIDs);
00159   free(lows);
00160   free(highs);
00161 
00162   // Write the dataset
00163   rc = fc_writeDataset(dataset, exofile_name, FC_FT_EXODUS);
00164   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to write exodus dataset");
00165 
00166   // all done
00167   fc_finalLibrary();
00168 
00169   exit(0);
00170 }
00171
Generated on Wed Oct 31 11:09:59 2007 for FCLib by  1.5.1
